snippet: Mr. Gerhaher, set to perform at Alice Tully Hall, is considered one of the greatest proponents of the lied tradition since Dietrich Fischer-Dieskau.
abstract: Highly anticipated recital of Franz Schubert's Winterreise song cycle will be performed at Alice Tully Hall by Chamber Music Society of Lincoln Center and baritone Christian Gerhaher without sets, special effects or other frills.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Gerhaher, set to perform at Alice Tully Hall, is considered one of the greatest proponents of the lied tradition since Dietrich Fischer-Dieskau.

headline.main: Christian Gerhaher Sings ‘Winterreise’ Without All the Frills
headline.print_headline: Art Songs Without All the Frills

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Chamber Music Society of Lincoln Center
